name: Marginalia hero [eng/rus]
description:
Marginalia hero -- it is an arcade game with RPG elements in medieval marginalia setting ( strange and weird drawings from illuminated manuscripts). You are about to fight creatures and monsters, which was really painted by medieval artists about 5 centuries ago.

Key features:

  • unique looking graphics style
  • addictive and challenging gameplay
  • 70+ items for customization and upgrading
  • 200 levels with strange and weird medieval creatures
  • one finger control
  • atmospheric medieval background music
  • heroic challenges and bossfight levels
